fields.value:
* If you convert someone at night, they will be given a "any" slot. This may even roll factions not within the confines of the original list. This conversion is immediate and they may act as soon as they get their role.
* If you convert someone at day, an announcement about this will be made. The converted player gets 2 different rolecards and may choose to become one. Both roles will be drawn from an "any" slot and can roll factions that are not within the confines of the original game. They may not act the same day.
* Converted players do not count torwards majority, but may still vote unless specified otherwise
* Converted players do not have to actively play if they choose to.
Wincon: Convert 3 people to participate in the game and post at least 5 messages
